title: Jikker who locked my thread:

replies.body:
Jikker was *extremely* generous here, in that you did not receive a punishment for some of the comments of yours that were removed. I would not recommend pushing said luck further.

**EDIT:** The comments in this thread have started trashing the OP, which is not acceptable. Thread locked.

I don't do anything that is not righteous. As Socrates said the path of the righteous is one of suffering. Your message boards are a cesspool of profanity Mr. The Djinn. How can the rat in the sewer look down on the eagle in the air?

Also I am accustomed to being "punished" by men on the Internet, even in my mid thirties. As long as a man remains just and righteous throughout his life there will always be some wretch trying to chastise him. This is why they made Socrates drink hemlock in the end. He told _the truth._

Me, I'm not a petty servant trying to bully and punish people. Words and deeds are enough to suffice for my dealings in life. I predict that with Jikker though he will become so overcome by impotency that he will hit the punish button. For he has no clear image of propriety, has made several mistakes (he locked a thread for an erroneous reason), and isn't wise enough to understand or answer me in a way that is becoming of his excessive pride.

> [{quoted}](name=B1GTYMER,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=YyNdTKwB,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2019-01-02T20:26:27.871+0000)I don't do anything that is not righteous. As Socrates said the path of the righteous is one of suffering. Your message boards are a cesspool of profanity Mr. The Djinn. How can the rat in the sewer look down on the eagle in the air?

As there seems to be some desire to defend the insulting posts you made, let me be a bit more clear: if you continue to behave towards others the way you did in the removed comments in that thread, I will personally see to it that you are not able to keep doing so. Follow the **Universal Rules**, or find another board to post on. You got a free pass here because the moderator in question was feeling nice today. Don't waste it.

I already said that the posts that others made to me were insulting, and they are in this thread too. Any child that speaks to an adult without proper decorum is insulting. Take your rule book and sit on it for all I care. You hold attachment to a message board that is thick with profanity, and are threatening to punish one of the few intelligent men that writes on it. You are thus a foolish man. I laugh in your face you rustic brute. It would be the highest honour of my day to be cast out of a message board full of such loathsome philistines. That shows me that my words cannot be argued, and that the only recourse of the rough men is their arms.

Hah, i can't say your ramblings aren't entertaining. 
I guess this thread will be locked too.

fukken gotteem bois

Dammit!
You successfully baited me.

I did read your previous thread because of this one and now I wished I hadn't...
r/iamverysmart is leaking.

Dude, fuck reworks, but your rants and toxic comments went way overboard. I suggest a little restrain next time. 

Listen to mods, mate.

Try constructing valid arguments and leaving out unnecessary emotions.

Could have been a good discussion but you ruined it yourself.

I don't understand how people can't think 1 second before opening their mouths. 
Yet you somehow managed to post a whole thread without thinking one second.
Seriously, how do you do this ?

Your thread got locked because you were acting like a self-righteous ass, both in the original post and in the replies. Absurdly toxic, even by the standards of League. Not to mention, your thread had a heavy focus on champion identity and it being lost by rework, and while that splits between gameplay and SAS, it is generally relegated to the latter rather than the former due to the prominent thematic aspect.

Not to mention, you got lucky Jikker didn't just drop the ol' ban hammer on you, because like I said, you hit truly spectacular levels of toxicity.
Is this some kind of over elaborate troll, is that it?

honestly i cant truly comment on the part about comments mainly due to that fact that there removed (a bad feature, rather than hidden and you must click to reveal them a far better system) i must say if there was no profanity or any comments about how people should kill themselves there should be no real problem but small children cant handle big or difficult arguments (given your starting this thread and that nothing was actually wrong). now on the part where its under gameplay its not incorrect for it to be in gameplay or story, art, & sound but if he must find fault for it being in the wrong place it would be far far more accurate for him to say that it belongs more in general discussion as it pertained to gameplay (to a small extent kinda last paragraph at least) and story, art, & sound so i must agree that his judgment was wrong here most definitely.

p.s. please excuse that this is 2 very long run on sentences with bad grammar and next to no punctuation.

The comments was little to no profanity, but a large amount of condescension and just downright insulting just for commenting and disagreeing with the subject of the thread, to where it almost seemed like trolling. The comments in here are not far off from the ones in there.

so far on this thread i have seen nothing that should by all means be considered what you have just described them as, other than very calm unoffensive and down right tame insults. in fact i would much rather prefer this man over some of the Villarreal i have seen on these boards and in game that have gone unpunished

> [{quoted}](name=DeathShadow2,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=YyNdTKwB,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2019-01-02T21:42:25.375+0000)

> so far on this thread i have seen nothing that should by all means be considered what you have just described them as, other than very calm unoffensive and down right tame insults. in fact i would much rather prefer this man over some of the Villarreal i have seen on these boards and in game that have gone unpunished

It isn’t the “calm” or “tame”, but the attitude and intent. The intent of all the comments in the linked thread, and even here, was never to discuss with other people, but mainly to insult them for daring to disagree. That’s why I said it seemed almost trolling, there was no discussing, only insulting and deflecting. If someone posts a thread, and you and others comment expecting something to discuss, and just get insulted and told to leave, what would you think should be done about the thread?

Regardless, the intent of the comments was to insult those who responded, at which point they were taken care of. If someone did similar with foul language, they would have the same treatment. Key response is to report those incidents for the mods to look over, and when they get to it (because I am sure they get a fair number of reports), if it’s true, they’ll take action much like they did with the linked thread.

Read through the comments in this thread.

The level of egoism and condescension is _astounding._

im surprised you didnt catch a ban honestly, jikker is my favorite mod on here and by far one of the most fair and more laid back mods, if you got someone like periscope or most any other mod im sure you would have gotten a 24 hour ban

> [{quoted}](name=B1GTYMER,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=YyNdTKwB,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-02T20:02:43.541+0000)
> 
> Your notice of insults and inflammatory comments seems notably restricted.  If someone uses profanity in any way to me it is an insult. If I write a thoughtful thread and someone answers it in lowercase letters in monosyllables that is also an insult. It is a dishonour for a thirteen year old child to go up to two intelligent adults speaking to each other and contradict one of them words far beneath their level of discourse.

It's insulting to insinuate that everyone who disagrees with you is a teenager. It's also not against the League forum rules to curse, if that's an issue for you might I suggest getting a browser extension that replaces words. It'll help you avoid that.

> Your rules are childish and hopelessly naive. Why do you allow profanity on these message boards? That is far more of an eyesore than the words peasant and imbecile, which you erased. 

Again, cursing, not against the rules. Peasant and imbecile are almost always used in such a way as to be a jerk to someone else, which is in fact against the rules.

>How old are you? What is your religion and moral integrity?  

Religion != Moral Integrity. I'm an agnostic, I don't subscribe to any particular religious beliefs. I'm still a fairly moral person in my own, and others estimation.

>There are some great inconsistencies in what you advocate. A man that enforces &quot;respect&quot; and at the same time suffers people to use the worst profanity does not know goodness or morality. It is notably inconsistent and makes you seem to be a silver-tongued bully than anyone of any substantial morality. Don&#039;t speak to me of propriety. 

How exactly is cursing a moral or immoral act? I'm legitimately curious. How does me saying fuck impact my morality? I still try to do good and be good. I help others, I try to love everyone, I do my best to help people. I also say fuck. So how does that impact my morality?

I looked over your post that you linked & some of the comments on that post, I feel Jikker did the right thing here.

Considering that all your responses were removed, it didn't seem like you were looking to hold a conversation. Instead you attacked/Insulted anyone who had a difference of Opinion.

I've seen posts get straight up deleted because of stuff like this. Instead it was locked to prevent people from fighting back & forth.
